Yuma Regional Medical Center Sponsored Yuma Regional Medical Center is hiring! Join us in El Centro for our hiring event on Monday, January 30 from 10:00am- 6:00pm. WHERE Fairfield by Marriot 503 E Danenberg Dr. El Centro, CA 🏥 POSITIONS INCLUDE: ⚬ Nurses ⚬ Pharmacists ⚬ Radiological technologists ⚬ Medical laboratory scientists ⚬ IT specialists Full-time, part-time and seasonal opportunities are available. If you, or someone you know, are interested in a healthcare career, we hope you stop by to meet our HR team. To register ahead of time or to receive more information, we encourage you to fill out the following link: https://lnkd.in/gNCU-gSC . Please note that registration is not required to attend.
